articles.author: Vijay Kishore
articles.title: Stock Market LIVE: Sensex tops 63000, Nifty up 50 pts; Asian Paints, ITC shine | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Share Market LIVE Updates: Benchmark indices start in the green on Tuesday as Asian Paints and ITC gain with most stocks trading higher. Sensex gains 300 pts and Nifty climbs 90 pts. FMCG and IT climb; almost all sectors are trading in the green. Asian market…
articles.content: Indian indices start strongly with Sensex at a touching distance from 63,000 and Nifty trading above 18,650 after CPI inflation eased to 4.25% in May, compared to 4.70% in the previous month. Althoug… [+15320 chars]

articles.title: Eddies: Circular Currents And Their Influence On World's Hottest Ocean - Eurasia Review
articles.description: Water from the Pacific Ocean flows into the Indian Ocean via the Indonesia Archipelago Seas thanks to a vast network of currents dubbed the Indonesian Throughflow (ITF). The ITF acts as a heat and …
